title: Arch Linux’s December 2023 ISO Release Brings Linux 6.6 LTS, Updated Installer
description:
Arch Linux 2023.12.01 is now available for download as Arch Linux’s ISO release for December 2023 powered by Linux kernel 6.6 LTS and featuring an improved installation experience.

The post Arch Linux’s December 2023 ISO Release Brings Linux 6.6 LTS, Updated Installer appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
